comments:
I20040310 0800

I don't have a generally reproduceable test case but I can describe what 
happens.
I have the new search view as fastviews in both of my windows on a mult-monitor 
setup. I ask to open a new file (does not seem to matter how I open the new 
file).
Eclipse pops up the error dialog.
Dismissing it pops another error dialog. 
Continue forever.
